forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. High around 15C. SSE winds at 40 to 55 km/h, increasing to 65 to 95 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 130 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. High around 60F. SSE winds at 25 to 35 mph, increasing to 40 to 60 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy...thunderstorms likely this evening ...continued blustery with rain likely overnight. Low 12C. Winds SSW at 55 to 80 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers and a few thunderstorms likely. High 59F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 52F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
